name: Make a Mint
description:
Play as a "100% legit" unicorn with a bachelor's degree in economics. You help a  dragon balance the finances and orders while they cook the candy with fire. Hoard gold to keep the candy coming! But watch out- the dragon is temperamental, and things can get... out of control.

To play: WASD to move, approach candy to grab it, approach customer to give it. Gold is accepted automatically.

Made for GMTK jam 2020, theme: out of control.

Music Credit to Elvis Herod for his song Fighting Muzak.
